metadata.description: Your guide to the SOULFIRE Universe is here! Aspen's best-selling Soulfire series has celebrated over 10 years of exciting adventures, and now fans and new readers alike can explore even more of Michael Turner's magical journey with the first-ever MICHAEL TURNER'S SOULFIRE: SOURCEBOOK! Jam-packed from cover to cover with detailed character profiles, in-depth power charts, revealing story elements and so much more--this is the definitive source to learn about all things Soulfire!
metadata.name: The Soulfire Sourcebook
